reference.shortdesc: The no-topic-nesting element is a placeholder in the DITA architecture.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: It is not actually used by the default DITA document types; it is for use only when creating a validly customized document type where the information designer wants to eliminate the ability to nest topics. It is not intended for use by authors.

section.title: Processing expectations
section.p: The no-topic-nesting element has no associated output processing.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attribute is available on this element: .

p.i: This element is not intended to be used in source files.
